statements: UPDATE customers SET country='France' WHERE customer_id=1;
UPDATE customers SET first_name='Alice', last_name='Smith', favorite_cuisine='Italian' WHERE customer_id=5;

UPDATE customers SET preference = 'vegetarian' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE meals SET spiciness_level = 'medium' WHERE meal_name = 'Chicken Curry';
UPDATE customers SET preference = 'Vegetarian', allergies = 'Peanuts' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE meals SET spiciness_level = 'Medium', ingredients = 'Chicken, Rice, Spices' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE Customers SET email='newemail@example.com' WHERE customer_id=1;
UPDATE Meals SET side_dish='Salad' WHERE meal_id=3;

UPDATE Preferences SET spice_level = 5 WHERE preference_id = 3;

UPDATE Restaurant SET rating = 4.8 WHERE restaurant_id = '22222222-2222-2222-2222-222222222222';

UPDATE FoodItem SET price = price * 1.1 WHERE category = 'Dessert';
UPDATE customers SET first_name='John', last_name='Doe', age=30 WHERE customer_id=1;
